# R Projects: A Beginner's Guide {#appendix-r_projects}

```{r, include = FALSE}
source(file.path(usethis::proj_get(), "vignettes",  "_common.R"))
path <- fs::path_tidy(file.path(tempdir(), "template.project"))
fs::dir_create(path, recurse = TRUE)
```

## Creating a Standardized Project

```{r, echo=TRUE, eval=FALSE}
usethis2::create_project()
```

```{r usethis2-create_project, results='hide'}
withr::with_dir(path, {
    sapply(
        paste("package", c("devtools", "usethis"), sep = ":"), 
        function(name) try(base::detach(name, unload = TRUE, character.only = TRUE), silent = TRUE)
    )
    usethis::create_package(path, open = FALSE)
    usethis::use_testthat()
})
suppressWarnings(require(usethis, quietly = TRUE))
```

```{r, results='markup'}
fs::dir_tree(path, recurse = TRUE)
```
